titleStmt.title: A relation of the fearefull estate of Francis Spira in the yeare, 1548.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. L[egat] for Phil. Stephens, and Christoph. Meredith, at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,
